cards.title: Aspects of Accessibility (a11y) - Semantics, Contrast and... Anxiety?
cards.description: This article is a brief overview that covers a11y issues with page structure, contrast levels, and anxiety-inducing design.
cards.author: Sara W

cards.title: Conditionally Styling Selected Elements in a Grid Container
cards.description: This article will show a neat way to display selectable options in a grid. By handling more advanced selecting techniques that use combinators and pseudos, we can extend our styling powers far beyond any one item.
cards.author: Preethi

cards.title: Understanding the Template Element in HTML
cards.description: In this article, we will learn about the <template> HTML5 element, the benefits and downsides of utilizing them, and their usage.
cards.author: Jude Miracle

cards.title: Feature Flags: What They Are and How to Use Them
cards.description: Here’s a secret: new features are deployed to production long before they become available to everyone. Instead of big and risky deployments, you can use feature flags to enable functionality when you’re ready.
cards.author: Maarten Balliauw

cards.title: ViTest — yet another testing framework and runner
cards.description: Have you ever complained about the lack of testing frameworks in the JS ecosystem? Meet ViTest — another rival for Jest and Mocha.
cards.author: ViTest team

cards.title: The End of Localhost
cards.description: Dev environments should be cattle, not pets. It looks likely that in the future, most development will not be done on localhost, the most precious pet of all.
cards.author: swyx

cards.title: Using Typescript in React: a Crash Course
cards.description: Typescript helps you avoid mistakes and makes your code more comfortable for yourself and other developers in the project. That's why understanding the basic capabilities of TS is especially important nowadays.
cards.author: Ajibade Ola-Oluwa

cards.title: Understanding the Suspense API in React 18
cards.description: If you don't know what React Suspense is, this article will be helpful for you. With Suspense, you can optimize and significantly improve your app.
cards.author: Fernando Doglio

cards.title: Fetching and Updating Data with React Query
cards.description: React Query is one of the powerful libraries in React ecosystem for caching data. In this article, you will learn how to fetch and update a list of users from a database with React Query.
cards.author: Ajibade Ola-Oluwa
